name: Clumsy Santa
description:
On his way to deliver the presents to the children of the world, his sled hit some turbulence, and some of the presents have fallen out! It is your mission to retrieve the presents and bring them back to the sleigh in order to save Christmas!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • Space to interact (pickup/place)
  • R to take you back to the start
